text: Bɨ olap pen agɨnɨgab, Binɨb ogɨnap Klays nop gos lɨnepal, binɨb ogɨnap tap gɨtep gɨpal agɨnɨgab. Pen takaw agɨnɨgaban anɨb ak, nep pen agɨnɨgayn, Nad Klays nop gos lɨnepan ak pen, tap gɨtep ma ge nɨm, nad Klays nop gos lɨnepan ak tɨtay dɨl nɨgɨnɨgayn agɨnɨgayn? Yad pen tap gɨtep gen, nad nɨgɨnɨgaban, Klays nop gos lɨnepin.
